text: Dinara Alimbekava (; born 5 January 1996) is a Kazakhstan-born Belarusian biathlete. She won a gold medal in the 4×6 km relay at the 2018 Olympics.Dzinara Alimbekava. biathlonresults.com Alimbekava was born in Kazakhstan, to a Kazakh father and Russian mother. When she was three years old, her family moved to Belarus, where her younger brother Zhenya was born. Dzinara is professionally trained in piano, she skates and practices snowboarding in free time.От пианистки до биатлонистки.
